results.title: The Potential Therapeutic Application of Simvastatin for Brain Complications and Mechanisms of Action
results.text_hl: Recent studies have suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could be a promising therapeutic option for different @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@brain complications@@@ and diseases ranging from @DISEASE_Brain_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001932 @@@brain tumors@@@ (i.e., @DISEASE_Medulloblastoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008527 @@@medulloblastoma@@@ and @DISEASE_Glioblastoma @DISEASE_MESH:D005909 @@@glioblastoma@@@) to @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological disorders@@@ (i.e., @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@, and @DISEASE_Huntington_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Huntington's disease@@@).

citations.NLM: Vuu YM, Kadar Shahib A, Rastegar M. The Potential Therapeutic Application of Simvastatin for Brain Complications and Mechanisms of Action Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2023 Jun 22;16(7):. PMID: 37513826
citations.BibTeX: @article{37513826, title={The Potential Therapeutic Application of Simvastatin for Brain Complications and Mechanisms of Action}, author={Vuu YM and Kadar Shahib A and Rastegar M}, journal={Pharmaceuticals (Basel)}, volume={16}, number={7}}

results.title: Simvastatin Prevents Neurodegeneration in the MPTP Mouse Model of Parkinson's Disease via Inhibition of A1 Reactive Astrocytes.
results.text_hl: In light of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ favorable properties, it should be evaluated in the treatment of @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@ and related @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurologic disorders@@@ characterized by A1 reactive astrocytes.

citations.NLM: Du RW, Bu WG. Simvastatin Prevents Neurodegeneration in the MPTP Mouse Model of Parkinson's Disease via Inhibition of A1 Reactive Astrocytes. Neuroimmunomodulation. 2021;28(2):82-89. PMID: 33735898

results.title: Simvastatin alleviates experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis through regulating the balance of Th17 and Treg in mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ exhibits anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and immunomodulatory effects, potentially alleviating symptoms of @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological dysfunction@@@ of @DISEASE_Encephalomyelitis_Autoimmune_Experimental @DISEASE_MESH:D004681 @@@EAE@@@.

citations.NLM: Xu D, Wang M, Wang L. Simvastatin alleviates experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis through regulating the balance of Th17 and Treg in mice. Allergol Immunopathol (Madr). 2024;52(5):36-43. PMID: 39278849

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin ameliorates trimethyltin neurotoxicity and cognitive impairment through reversal of Alzheimer's-associated markers.
results.text_hl: The 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A (HMG-CoA) reductase inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@) has shown protective and promising therapeutic effects in @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological disorders@@@ such as @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ and @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Salari A, Roghani M, Khalili M. HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin ameliorates trimethyltin neurotoxicity and cognitive impairment through reversal of Alzheimer's-associated markers. Metab Brain Dis. 2024 Dec 20;40(1):74. PMID: 39704877

results.title: Simvastatin reduced ischemic brain injury and perfusion deficits in an embolic model of stroke.
results.text_hl: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ also improved @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological deficits@@@ and reduced @DISEASE_Brain_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain edema@@@ significantly (P < 0.05).

results.title: Simvastatin in traumatic brain injury: effect on brain edema mechanisms.
results.text_hl: We therefore investigated the effect of acute @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurologic deficits@@@, @DISEASE_Brain_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@cerebral edema@@@, and its origins.

results.title: Therapeutic effects of a combinatorial treatment of simvastatin and bone marrow stromal cells on experimental embolic stroke.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ receiving a dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in combination with BMSC administration demonstrated a significant reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological deficits@@@, a significant reduction in @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ volume and a significant decrease in @DISEASE_Brain_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain oedema@@@.
